item.title: Graphical linux desktop using NoMachine NX
item.description: This article explains how to connect to a graphical linux desktop within the JASMIN environment using NoMachine NX. Introduction   Using graphical applications over a wide-area network can be very slow, and is not recommended or supported on JASMIN.
